nutanix_onboarding_title: Hosted Private Cloud powered by Nutanix
nutanix_onboarding_description: Explore our new, all-in-one, scalable Private Cloud platform. It combines pre-installed Nutanix Cloud Platform licences with OVHcloud infrastructures that are 100% dedicated and secure. You get a ready-to-use Nutanix hyperconverged infrastructure (HCI) in just a few hours.
nutanix_onboarding_description_1: This solution is perfect for cloud migration strategies, implementing a Disaster Recovery Plan (DRP), and handling excess workloads.
